meta_description: Discover Cleveland's historic Dunham Tavern Museum & Gardens, a cultural and educational destination preserving early American history since 1824.
hours_text:
Dunham Tavern Museum & Gardens is open for tours on Wednesdays and Sundays from 1:00-4:00 pm. Gardens and grounds are open from dawn to dusk. Admission is always FREE (donations appreciated).

Tours of the historic Tavern Museum are docent-guided and last approximately 45 minutes. Tour size is limited, so please contact us ahead of time if your group consists of 10 or more people. Limited free parking is available on-site.

#### 

## VISIT

**Dunham Tavern Museum & Gardens**  
[6709 Euclid Avenue  
Cleveland, OH 44103](https://www.google.com/maps/place/6709+Euclid+Ave,+Cleveland,+OH+44103/@41.5051813,-81.6453776,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x8830fbadc097903d:0x9b38afc15fcbe63d!8m2!3d41.5051822!4d-81.6431497)  
[216-431-1060](tel:+12164311060)

collections_text:
Dunham Tavern Museum & Gardens is a nonprofit organization whose mission is to preserve, develop, and share historic Dunham Tavern and its campus as an educational and cultural resource. Established in 1824, Dunham Tavern is the oldest building still standing on its original site in the City of Cleveland. 

In 2021, we completed a campus-wide Master Plan to guide the future development of our buildings and grounds. The Master Plan will enable us to preserve Dunham’s history while imagining a visionary future for Dunham Tavern Museum & Gardens as a significant neighborhood asset and regional cultural destination. 

[ MASTER PLAN ](/s/Dunham_Master_Plan_Report_small.pdf)

### “IT IS PLANNED TO MAKE OF DUNHAM TAVERN AN AUTHENTIC MUSEUM OF EARLY AMERICAN LIFE… AND TO CONVERT THE LOT ON WHICH THE TAVERN STANDS INTO A PARK… PROVIDING A BREATHING SPACE IN WHAT HAS BECOME A MOST CONGESTED DISTRICT SO THAT THE OLD TAVERN MAY CONTINUE, IN A SOMEWHAT DIFFERENT FASHION, ITS ORIGINAL FUNCTION OF OFFERING REST AND REFRESHMENT TO THE WEARY. ”

— Katharine Gill Brooks, _Dunham Tavern_ , 1938

### AN INCLUSIVE PLACE THAT INSPIRES & ENRICHES LIVES THROUGH HISTORY, NATURE, & COMMUNITY.
